metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

workbook1-name.defaultValue: Recorded Future - C&C DNS Name to DNS Events - Correlation&Threat Hunting

workbook2-name.defaultValue: Recorded Future - Actively Communicating C&C IPs to DNS Events - Correlation&Threat Hunting

properties.description: Recorded Future Analytics Rule 1 with template
Identifies a match in DNSEvents from Recorded Future C2 DNS Name Domains Risklist.
properties.displayName: Detection of Malware C2 Domains in DNS Events

properties.description: Recorded Future Analytics Rule 2 with template
Identifies a match in Syslog from Recorded Future C2 DNS Name Domains Risklist.
properties.displayName: Detection of Malware C2 Domains in Syslog Events

properties.description: Recorded Future Analytics Rule 3 with template
Identifies a match in CommonSecurityLog from Recorded Future Hash Observed in Underground Virus Testing Sites RiskList.
properties.displayName: Detection of Specific Hashes in CommonSecurityLog

properties.description: Recorded Future Analytics Rule 4 with template
Identifies a match in Azure Activity Events from Recorded Future Actively Communicating C&C Server Risklist.
properties.displayName: Detection of Malware C2 IPs in Azure Act. Events

properties.description: Recorded Future Analytics Rule 5 with template
Identifies a match in DnsEvents from Recorded Future Actively Communicating C&C Server Risklist.
properties.displayName: Detection of Malware C2 IPs in DNS Events
properties.query:
// Identifies a match in DnsEvent from the Recorded Future C2 Malware Detection IPs (Actively Communicating C&C Server RiskList)
let dt_lookBack = 1h;
let ioc_lookBack = 1d;
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
// Picking up only Recorded Future IOC's that are pertinent to the use case (Malware C2 Detection)
| where Description == "Recorded Future - IP - Actively Communicating C&C Server"
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(ioc_lookBack) and ExpirationDateTime > now()
| where Active == true
| extend TI_ipEntity = NetworkIP
| join (
  DnsEvents | where TimeGenerated >= ago(dt_lookBack)
  | where SubType =~ "LookupQuery" and isnotempty(IPAddresses)
  | extend SingleIP = split(IPAddresses, ",")
  | mvexpand SingleIP
  | extend SingleIP = tostring(SingleIP)
  // renaming time column so it is clear the log this came from
  | extend DNS_TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated
  )
on $left.TI_ipEntity == $right.SingleIP
| where DNS_TimeGenerated >= TimeGenerated and DNS_TimeGenerated < ExpirationDateTime
| summarize LatestIndicatorTime = arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| project LatestIndicatorTime, ActivityGroupNames, IndicatorId, ThreatType, Url, ExpirationDateTime, ConfidenceScore, DNS_TimeGenerated, TI_ipEntity, Computer, EventId, SubType, ClientIP, Name, IPAddresses, NetworkIP, Description, AdditionalInformation
| extend timestamp = DNS_TimeGenerated, IPCustomEntity = ClientIP, HostCustomEntity = Computer, URLCustomEntity = Url

properties.description: Recorded Future Analytics Rule 6 with template
Identifies a match in Syslog from Recorded Future URLs Recently Reported as malicious by Insikt Group.
properties.displayName: Detection of Malicious URLs in Syslog Events

metadata.title: RecordedFuture-ImportToSentinel
metadata.description: This playbook is purposed to listen (via batching mechanism provided by Microsoft Azure) for incoming messages from the IndicatorProcessor Playbooks and create submit the indicators for creation

content.description: Recorded Future - DOMAIN - C2 DNS Name

metadata.title: RecordedFuture-DOMAIN-C2_DNS_Name-IndicatorProcessor
metadata.description: This playbook leverages the Recorded Future API and automatically imports the C&C DNS Name Domain RiskList, as Threat Intelligence Indicators, for detection purposes in Microsoft Sentinel

content.description: Recorded Future - HASH - Observed in Underground Virus Testing Sites

metadata.title: RecordedFuture-HASH-Obs_in_Underground-IndicatorProcessor
metadata.description: This playbook leverages the Recorded Future API and automatically imports the Observed in Underground Virus Testing Sites Hash RiskList, as Threat Intelligence Indicators, for detection purposes in Microsoft Sentinel

body.message:
Recorded Future Domain Enrichment
Domain: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_DNS_Resolution')?['domainName']}
Risk Score: @{body('Domain_Enrichment')?['data']?['risk']?['score']}
Risk Rules: @{variables('Rules')}
Link to Intelligence Card: @{body('Domain_Enrichment')?['data']?['intelCard']}

Recorded Future Hash Enrichment
Hash: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_File_Hash')?['hashValue']}
Risk Score: @{body('Hash_Enrichment')?['data']?['risk']?['score']}
Risk Rules: @{variables('Rules')}
Link to Intelligence Card: @{body('Hash_Enrichment')?['data']?['intelCard']}

Recorded Future URL Enrichment
URL: @{replace(body('Parse_JSON_-_Url')?['url'],'.','[.]')}
Risk Score: @{body('URL_Enrichment')?['data']?['risk']?['score']}
Risk Rules: @{variables('Rules')}

Recorded Future IP Enrichment
IP: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_Ip')?['address']}
Risk Score: @{body('IP_Enrichment')?['data']?['risk']?['score']}
Risk Rules: @{variables('Rules')}
Link to Intelligence Card: @{body('IP_Enrichment')?['data']?['intelCard']}

metadata.title: RecordedFuture-IOC_Enrichment-IP_Domain_URL_Hash
metadata.description: This playbook leverages the Recorded Future API to automatically enrich the IP, Domain, Url & Hash indicators, found in Sentinel incidents, with the following context: Risk Score, Risk Rules and Link to Intelligence Card. The enrichment content will be posted as a comment in the Sentinel incident

content.description: Recorded Future - IP - Actively Communicating C&C Server

metadata.title: RecordedFuture-IP-Actively_Comm_C2_Server-IndicatorProcessor
metadata.description: This playbook leverages the Recorded Future API and automatically imports the Actively Communicating C&C Server IP RiskList, as Threat Intelligence Indicators, for detection purposes in Microsoft Sentinel

content.description: Recorded Future - URL - Recently Reported by Insikt Group

metadata.title: RecordedFuture-URL-Recent_Rep_by_Insikt_Group-IndicatorProcessor
metadata.description: This playbook leverages the Recorded Future API and automatically imports the Recently Reported by Insikt Group URL RiskList, as Threat Intelligence Indicators, for detection purposes in Microsoft Sentinel
